title: Aikkiyam AvOmE
sahitya:
aikkiyam AvOmE Aruyirk-kulamellAm OrAnma nEyattil


anupallavi

  saukhyamAgavE avaravar pulamaikkut-takkapaDi uzhaittu sari samAnamAgavE


caraNam    sUriya candirar tAraka tulangiDum tUya vAnkuDai nizhalil
nEriya sIriya samanala yOgattil nIr nilam payirena nIDu vaLam peruga
